name: Avalanche (Kalyen)
description:
Play as a snowman and avoid rolling snowballs. That's all, really.

Made with Makecode Arcade for Low Effort Jam 7. 

Also playable here (with source code): https://makecode.com/_ejYDkKVyiJWo

Controls

Move = A/D or arrow keys

A button = Z or spacebar

...or you can click the buttons :)
